forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this evening will give way to mainly clear skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.
